duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the daily workflow and ensure service standards are met in the Sterile Processing department.
Coordinate work assignments and oversee the monthly schedule for staff.
Serve as a resource to staff for issues surrounding instrumentation and sterilization.
Participate in the hiring selection process and collaborate with management to develop policies and procedures for the department.
Provide leadership and supervisory guidance in quality improvement efforts and maintain required regulatory records and quality assurance reports.
Collaborate effectively with the Instrument Coordinator to assure seamless flow of surgical supplies and instruments.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred. Certification from IAHCSMM, CBSPD, or other nationally recognized certifying body required.
